string.value: You meet Heena, who is worried the sun will damage her skin. Go get a mirror from her sister, Sarah, so she can check.
Heena asked you to get a mirror from her sister, so you walked all the way to Sarah.
You must be the new traveler. I'll be giving you important information so listen up. First, if you want to talk to anyone, #bclick#k the person with your mouse.
The #bleft and right arrows#k allow you to move. Press #bAlt#k to jump. Jump diagonally by pressing both together.
Man, it's scorching hot today! The sun is burning my beautiful skin! Can you get me a #bmirror#k from #r#p2100##k, please? I have to check my skin!

If you want to check your progress in a quest, open the #bQuest Window#k by pressing the #bQ key#k, then press #bQuest Helper#k. You'll be able to view the progress of quests registered to the Quest Helper.
Thank you. #r#p2100##k is on the hill to the east, hanging laundry. The mirror looks like this #i4031003#.
Don't want to? Fine, come back when you change your mind.
Haven't met with #r#p2100##k yet? She should be down a hill to the east. It shouldn't be hard to find her.
